title: Rangers 2-3 Liverpool LIVE score: Team news, TV channel and live stream for legends match
text:
Steven Gerrard will play for both sides this afternoon as Rangers legends take on their Liverpool counterparts at Ibrox.

Reds great Gerrard is the current Gers manager and will be a central figure in the match which is being played in aid of the Rangers Charity Foundation and the LFC Foundation.

Jamie Carragher, Luis Garcia and Emile Heskey are among the other names in the Liverpool side while the likes of Nacho Novo, Peter Lovenkrands and Charlie Adam will play for Rangers.

You can follow all the action LIVE right here.

Liverpool Legends squad: Jerzy Dudek, Glen Johnson, Jose Enrique, Jason McAteer, Steven Gerrard, Emile Heskey, Patrik Berger, Luis Garcia, Vladimir Smicer, Jermaine Pennant, Dirk Kuyt, Chris Kirkland, Jamie Carragher, Stephen Warnock.

Rangers Legends squad: Ronald Wattereus, Richard Gough, Jonatan Johansson, Peter Lovenkrands, Jorg Albertz, Kris Boyd, Michael Mols, Nacho Novo, Carlos Cuellar, Lee McCulloch, Sasa Papac, Clint Hill, Alan Hutton, Marvin Andrews, Gregory Vignal, Pedro Mendes, Trevor Steven, Alex Rae, Steven Gerrard, Thomas Buffel, Charlie Adam.
description: Steven Gerrard plays for both sides in the match at Ibrox. Kickoff at 3PM
